definition: to slip (lose one's footing)
surname Hua
to slip/to slide/smooth/slippery/cunning
to fall/to collapse/to lie horizontally/to overthrow/to fail/to go bankrupt/to change (trains or buses)/to move around/to resell at a profit
to place upside down/to invert/to pour/to throw out/to move backwards/however/actually/as a matter of fact/contrary to expectation

sentences.english: One day-he slipped and hurt his leg.
sentences.chinese: 有一天他滑倒，把腿摔壞了。

sentences.english: Me and the bike and the deer slid down. The bike broke in half.
sentences.chinese: 我，車河鹿都滑倒了，車壞成了兩半。

sentences.english: He rushed to halp the old man up when he slipped on the ice.
sentences.chinese: 老人在冰上滑倒時，他跑過去把他扶了起來。

sentences.english: As I was getting on the bus, I slipped and hurt my foot.
sentences.chinese: 我在上公共汽車時滑倒了，把腳扭傷了。

sentences.english: The bowling alley is very smooth, and I fall down sometimes.
sentences.chinese: 保齡球道很滑，我有時候會滑倒。

sentences.english: You will get better traction on fresh snow and reduce the chance for slipping.
sentences.chinese: 在新雪上你能獲得更好的動力，減少滑倒的機會。

sentences.english: You may slip and burst your crust by doing so.
sentences.chinese: 你這樣做會滑倒弄破皮的。

sentences.english: She slipped on the polished floor and broke her leg.
sentences.chinese: 她滑倒在光滑的地板上，摔斷了腿。

sentences.english: I was unlucky to slip on a banana skin and fall over.
sentences.chinese: 我真倒黴，踩在香蕉皮上滑倒了。

sentences.english: He slipped as he tried to waltz on the parquet floor.
sentences.chinese: 他想在鑲木地板上旋幾個舞步，滑倒了。

sentences.english: Loose grit fouling equipment and also producing a slip hazard.
sentences.chinese: 散落的粗砂堵塞設備，同時引起滑倒危險。

sentences.english: We are amused to see that he slid on a banana skin.
sentences.chinese: 看到他被香蕉皮滑倒我們感到很好笑。

sentences.english: He slipped on the icy road and broke his leg.
sentences.chinese: 他在結冰的路面上滑倒而摔斷了腿。

sentences.english: I slipped on a patch of oil.
sentences.chinese: 我踩在一灘油上滑倒了。

sentences.english: Non-slip finished to preven injury or grazing even in wet conditions.
sentences.chinese: 表面止滑處理，即使潮溼也不易滑倒擦傷。

sentences.english: A Prius glides down the street.

definition: to fall down/to slip and fall/to throw sb to the ground
to injure oneself in a fall
to skid/to slip/to slide
to trip/to stumble
to fall/fig. to suffer a setback
to throw down/to fall/to drop and break
to knock sth over
to fall down/to take a fall
high, lofty/precipitous
to sprain (one's ankle)/see 崴子[wai3 zi5]
incautious/inattentive
to knock down/to knock over/to run over (sb)
to tumble/to fall/fig. to suffer a reverse (in politics or business)
landslide
to trip and fall/to wrestle/wrestling (sports)
to collect water/to be covered with water/to pond/accumulated water/ponding
to freeze
